text: Dame Joan Ann Plowright, Baroness Olivier DBE (28 October 1929 - 16 January 2025) was an English actress. Her career spanned over sixty years. She won two Golden Globe Awards and a Tony Award and was nominated for an Academy Award, an Emmy and two BAFTA Awards.Joan Plowright profile at FilmReference.com She was married to the actor Laurence Olivier from 1961 until his death in 1989.
